hero.headline: Gemini 3 Pro Unveiled: Google's Frontier Vision AI Model Sets New Benchmark
hero.summary: Google announced Gemini 3 Pro, their latest vision AI model that sets new standards for multimodal understanding. The model demonstrates exceptional performance on vision benchmarks while maintaining strong reasoning capabilities across text, code, and image analysis.
hero.whyItMatters: This positions Google firmly in the frontier AI race alongside Claude Opus 4.5 and GPT-5.1. For prompt engineers, Gemini 3 Pro's vision capabilities open new possibilities for multimodal workflows, image-based code generation, and visual debugging—areas where AI coding assistants have been limited.

topStories.title: Snowflake and Anthropic Expand $200M Agentic AI Partnership
topStories.summary: Anthropic announced a multi-year, $200 million expansion with Snowflake, making Claude models available to 12,600+ global customers. Claude Code is now enhancing developer productivity across Snowflake's engineering organization as AI coding becomes enterprise standard.

topStories.title: byLLM: Open-Source Framework Eliminates Manual Prompt Engineering
topStories.summary: Researchers at SPLASH 2025 presented byLLM, a framework that integrates LLMs into software with a single line of code—no manual prompt engineering required. Tests showed developers completed tasks 3x faster and wrote 45% fewer lines of code compared to DSPy.

topStories.title: SerpApi Launches Official MCP Server for AI-Powered Search Integration
topStories.summary: SerpApi released their official MCP server, enabling Claude, Cursor, and other AI tools to perform real-time web searches. The integration brings search-augmented generation capabilities directly into agentic coding workflows.

topStories.title: Context Engineering Replaces Prompt Engineering as the New Frontier
topStories.summary: Industry experts declare 'context engineering' the new paradigm for AI control. It's no longer about clever wording—it's about designing environments where AI can think with depth and consistency. The shift focuses on user intent, conversation history, and training data structure.

trendingRepos.name: rustfs/rustfs
trendingRepos.description: 2.3x faster than MinIO for 4KB payloads. S3-compatible high-performance object storage written in Rust, supporting migration from MinIO and Ceph.

trendingRepos.name: oven-sh/bun
trendingRepos.description: Incredibly fast JavaScript runtime, bundler, test runner, and package manager—all in one. Surging in popularity after Anthropic acquisition news.

trendingRepos.name: microsoft/VibeVoice
trendingRepos.description: Microsoft's open-source frontier voice AI for building conversational applications with natural speech synthesis and recognition.

trendingRepos.name: sinelaw/fresh
trendingRepos.description: Text editor for your terminal: easy, powerful and fast. A modern alternative for developers who want vim-like efficiency without the learning curve.

trendingSkills.name: command
trendingSkills.description: Create and modify Symfony Console commands with support for CLI interactions and validation patterns. Perfect for Laravel and Symfony developers.

trendingSkills.name: launch-planner
trendingSkills.description: Transform product ideas into shippable MVPs with guidance on PRDs, scoping, and building with Next.js and Supabase.

trendingSkills.name: fullstack-backend-master
trendingSkills.description: Master-level engineering for APIs, databases, authentication, and microservices with production-grade standards.

trendingSkills.name: maplibre-navigation
trendingSkills.description: Develop GPS navigation features using MapLibre GL including maps, routing, geolocation, and layer management.

newMcpServers.name: serpapi-mcp
newMcpServers.description: Official SerpApi MCP server for real-time web search integration. Add search-augmented generation to your AI workflows with structured search results.

newMcpServers.name: ultimate-mcp-server
newMcpServers.description: Complete AI agent operating system with 50+ capabilities: multiple LLM providers, browser automation, Excel manipulation, database interactions, and document processing.

newMcpServers.name: azure-mcp-server
newMcpServers.description: Microsoft's official MCP server for Azure services. Connect AI agents to Azure cloud infrastructure for deployments, monitoring, and resource management.

newMcpServers.name: dbt-mcp-server
newMcpServers.description: Official dbt (data build tool) MCP server for project metadata discovery, model information, and semantic layer querying. Essential for data engineers.

highlights: Background Agent Support - agents now run in the background while you work, enabling parallel processing
New --disable-slash-commands CLI flag to completely disable all slash commands
MCP server quick toggling with /mcp enable and /mcp disable commands
Built-in holiday theme for seasonal customization
MCP tool update notifications for better server management
Improved word navigation for CJK characters and extension settings management
Codex Max is now the default model with improved async handling
New /resume slash command with better session resumption performance
Linear integration - mention @Codex in issues to trigger cloud tasks

notableQuotes.quote: Context engineering is replacing prompt engineering as the new frontier of control. It's not about clever wording anymore—it's about designing environments where AI can think with depth, consistency, and purpose.
notableQuotes.author: KDnuggets Editorial

notableQuotes.quote: Developers using byLLM completed tasks over three times faster and wrote 45% fewer lines of code. The framework eliminates manual prompt engineering by integrating LLMs directly into existing software with a single line of code.
notableQuotes.author: SPLASH 2025 Researchers

notableQuotes.quote: Claude Code enhances developer productivity and innovation across Snowflake's engineering organization. This $200 million expansion makes Claude models available to more than 12,600 global customers.
notableQuotes.author: Anthropic & Snowflake

prompt: Daily AI news digest generated by fetching from personal-homepage API feed, web searches for Claude Code/Gemini CLI/OpenAI Codex December 2025 news, trending GitHub repos via trotd, changelogs from all three tools, SkillsMP Claude skills feed, MCP server catalog, and YouTube trending API. Focus on Gemini 3 Pro as hero (fresh announcement), Snowflake partnership, byLLM research breakthrough, and context engineering paradigm shift.
